Lord of Horn Hill05287crvlk371eoqyb37f13j376yvun4y2vy1665552014-12-01T00:58:51ZSon Of Fire24907634The '''Lord of Horn Hill''' is the title held by the head of [[House Tarly]]; vassals of [[House Tyrell]] of [[Highgarden]]. The bearer rules the castle [[Horn Hill]] in the [[Reach]].

The current Lord of Horn Hill is [[Randyll Tarly]].
